EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.Email 1 - Zero Emission
EmailTemplate.subject: Cut your base station energy bills by 84%
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Single RAN - the solution that reduces energy costs Reducing costs and saving energy - there’s a way to do both Most operator carbon emissions come from radio access networks (RAN). Reducing these shows you’re environmentally responsible, and saves you substantial costs.
With Nokia Single RAN you can massively reduce your energy bills. One operator is enjoying an 84 percent cut. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
